definition: School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: My favorite American author right now writes novels.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡的美國作家是一位小說家。

sentences.english: We've heard nothing from the novelist for years.
sentences.chinese: 那位小說家已沉寂了多年。

sentences.english: The novelist lapped up great praise from critics.
sentences.chinese: 小說家欣然接受了批評家們的高度讚揚。

sentences.english: I would like to be a novelist who is more accomplished than the last one.
sentences.chinese: 我想當個比上輩子更成功的小說家。
狄更斯是位多產的小說家。

sentences.english: Helen is a very well-known novelist in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 海倫是澳大利亞非常著名的小說家。

sentences.english: God, that would have saved a lot of novelists some trouble.
sentences.chinese: 上帝啊，這倒是給很多小說家省掉了不少麻煩。

sentences.english: French novelist Colette giving advice to her daughter.
sentences.chinese: 法國小說家科萊特給女兒的建議。

sentences.english: Thackeray was the novelist of the elegant world of the aristocracy.
sentences.chinese: 薩克雷是貴族社會的優雅世界的小說家。

sentences.english: Mr. Er Yuehe is a celebrated novelist on Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 二月河先生是一位清史演義題材的著名小說家。

sentences.english: The novelist must look onbhumanity without partiality _r prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 小說家必須以無偏私無成見的眼光去看待人類。

sentences.english: Vladimir Nabokov is not only a wellknown novelist but also an influential translator.
sentences.chinese: 納博科夫既是著名的小說家，又是出色的翻譯家。

sentences.english: Regardless of the genius of the novelists readers become less and less interested in pure literature.
sentences.chinese: 儘管小說家才華橫溢，然而純文學的讀者越來越少。

sentences.english: Book-shop owners develop a good relationship with novelists.
sentences.chinese: 書坊主與小說家的關係密切。

sentences.english: The novelist must look on humanity without partiality or prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 小說家必須以無偏私無成見的眼光去看待人類。

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3
